00035 static bool pci_sortf(const ProbeCellInfo & A, const ProbeCellInfo & B) {
00036         return (A.probe_set_idx < B.probe_set_idx);
00037         }
00038

00045     {

00047     SelfDoc doc;
00048     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());

00050     doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00051     return doc;

00059 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodHighPassFilter::

00061     {
00062     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00063 
00064     SelfDoc::Opt MiniBlockRows = {"l2r-mini-block-rows",
00065         SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "8", "8", "NA", "NA", "Mini block rows."};
00066     opts.push_back(MiniBlockRows);
00067 
00068     SelfDoc::Opt MiniBlockCols = {"l2r-mini-block-cols",
00069         SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "8", "8", "NA", "NA", "Mini block columns."};
00070     opts.push_back(MiniBlockCols);
00071

00073         SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "256.0", "256.0", "NA", "NA",
00074         "Global smooth weight."};

00078         SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "64.0", "64.0", "NA", "NA",
00079         "Local smooth weight."};

00083         "0.0001", "0.0001", "NA", "NA", "Converged."};

00094 /**
00095  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00096  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00097  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00098  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00099  *
00100  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00101  *
00102  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00103  */
00104 SelfCreate * CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodHighPassFilter::
00105         newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params) 
00106     {
00107     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00108     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00109     CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodHighPassFilter * pMethod =
00110         new CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodHighPassFilter();
00111     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00112 
00113     pMethod->mini_block_rows = setupIntParameter("l2r-mini-block-rows",
00114         strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00115 
00116     pMethod->mini_block_cols = setupIntParameter("l2r-mini-block-cols",
00117         strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00118 
00119     pMethod->global_smooth_weight =
00120         setupDoubleParameter("l2r-global-smooth-weight",
00121         strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00122 
00123     pMethod->local_smooth_weight =
00124         setupDoubleParameter("l2r-local-smooth-weight",
00125         strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00126 
00127     pMethod->converged =
00128         setupDoubleParameter("l2r-converged", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00129 
00130     pMethod->use_hpf = setupBoolParameter("use", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00131     
00132     return pMethod;
00133     }

00156 /**
00157  * @brief Run the calculations.
00158  */
00159 void CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodHighPassFilter::run()
00160     {
00161     Verbose::out(1,
00162         "CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodHighPassFilter::run(...) start");
00163 
00164     if (!use_hpf) { Verbose::out(1,
00165          "Use of high pass filter set to false. Exiting HPF");
00166         return;
00167         }
00168 
00169     // Note that for chips so far, a dimension swap needs to occur to
00170     // use a right handed coordinate system.
00171 
00172     // for example 2680 rows in SNP6 and CytoSCanHD;
00173     int image_rows = m_pEngine->getOptInt("probe-columns-count");
00174 
00175     // for example 2572 columns in SNP6 and CytoSCanHD;
00176     int image_cols = m_pEngine->getOptInt("probe-rows-count");
00177 
00178 
00179     // fetch pointers to copy number probes and probe sets
00180     CNProbeArray * cn_probes = getProbes();
00181     CNProbeSetArray * cn_probe_sets = CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets();
00182 
00183     // this order produces a valid CNPobe::getProbeSetIndex()
00184     cn_probe_sets->quickSort(0);
00185 
00186     // For speed we need a fast lookup table - no maps
00187     vector<ProbeCellInfo>pc_info_vec;
00188 
00189     // go through all the probes used only for copy number and collect
00190     // their array positions, probe ids and indices into the array of
00191     // probe sets.
00192     for (int i=0; i<cn_probes->size(); i++) {
00193         // CNProbe index into the CNProbeSet array
00194         int probe_set_idx = cn_probes->at(i)->getProbeSetIndex();
00195 
00196         // Only non-polymorphic probes are high pass filtered
00197         if(!cn_probe_sets->at(probe_set_idx)->processAsCN()) continue;
00198 
00199         // It may turn out due to custom annotation files or product
00200         // development quirks that some copy number probes are out of
00201         // the workflow and might still carry raw intensities.  Ignore
00202         // them.
00203         if(!cn_probe_sets->at(probe_set_idx)->processAsCNNormalize()) continue;
00204 
00205         // The probe ID can be used to obtain probe cell array coordinates
00206         int probe_id = cn_probes->at(i)->getProbeID();
00207 
00208         // Here are the coordinates in a right hand coordinate system
00209         pair<int,int> row_col =
00210             probeid_to_rc(probe_id,image_rows,image_cols);
00211 
00212         // Assemble the above into a struct and push back
00213         ProbeCellInfo PCI;
00214         PCI.row = row_col.first;
00215         PCI.col = row_col.second;
00216         PCI.probe_id = probe_id;
00217         PCI.probe_set_idx = probe_set_idx;
00218         PCI.autosome = false;
00219         if (cn_probe_sets->at(probe_set_idx)->getChromosome() < 23) {
00220             PCI.autosome = true;
00221             }
00222         pc_info_vec.push_back(PCI);
00223         }
00224 
00225     //  If there is nothing to do just exit
00226     if (!pc_info_vec.size()) return;
00227 
00228 
00229     // Make an instance of the high pass filter.  Resizing or clearing is
00230     // not implemented.  A new one is always needed.
00231     DataBlock * DB = new DataBlock(image_rows, image_cols,
00232                         mini_block_rows, mini_block_cols);
00233 
00234 
00235     // Load up the DataBlock with whatever was observed.  The elements
00236     // in the Datablock with no entries are missing values.  Missing
00237     // values are okay. 
00238     for (vector<ProbeCellInfo>::iterator iter=pc_info_vec.begin();
00239             iter != pc_info_vec.end(); iter++) {
00240         if (!iter->autosome) continue;
00241         double log2r = cn_probe_sets->at(iter->probe_set_idx)->getLog2Ratio();
00242         DB->set_value(iter->row,iter->col,log2r);
00243         }
00244 
00245 
00246     // Load the full hierarchy of the data block and run to convergence.
00247     DB->load_array_level();
00248     DB->mrf_smooth(local_smooth_weight, global_smooth_weight, converged);
00249 
00250     // order by array index to avoid using a lookup map
00251     sort(pc_info_vec.begin(),pc_info_vec.end(),pci_sortf);
00252 
00253     // Subtract the background estimate from estimated DataBlock.
00254     int count=0;
00255     double log2r_backg = 0.0;
00256     vector<ProbeCellInfo>::iterator pci_iter = pc_info_vec.begin();
00257 
00258     double low_pass_norm = 0.0;
00259     int low_pass_count=0;
00260 
00261     while (pci_iter != pc_info_vec.end()) {
00262         int probe_set_idx = pci_iter->probe_set_idx;
00263         count += 1;
00264 
00265         double backg = DB->background(pci_iter->row,pci_iter->col);
00266         log2r_backg += backg;
00267         low_pass_norm += backg*backg;
00268         low_pass_count++;
00269         
00270         pci_iter++;
00271 
00272         // the backgrounds of probes in a probe set are averaged
00273         if (pci_iter != pc_info_vec.end()) {
00274             if (pci_iter->probe_set_idx == probe_set_idx) continue;
00275             }
00276 
00277         // subtract the low pass from the log2r to get the high pass
00278         double log2r_obs = cn_probe_sets->at(probe_set_idx)->getLog2Ratio();
00279         log2r_obs -= log2r_backg/count;
00280         cn_probe_sets->getAt(probe_set_idx)->setLog2Ratio(log2r_obs);
00281 
00282         log2r_backg = 0.0;
00283         count = 0;
00284         }
00285 
00286     // free memory that was allocated
00287     delete DB;
00288 
00289     low_pass_norm = 128.0*sqrt(low_pass_norm/low_pass_count);
00290     getExperiment()->setL2Gradient(low_pass_norm);
00291 
00292     // out of courtesy
00293     cn_probe_sets->quickSort(1);
00294     }
Generated on Tue Jul 15 2014 10:37:41 for Affymetrix Power Tools by  1.7.1
